article.title: AAI Corporation Supports Shadow 200 Unmanned Aircraft
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: AAI Corporation, Hunt Valley, Maryland, was awarded an $11,074,078 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the engineering services in support of the Shadow 200 unmanned aerial systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
